text: The Men's 15 kilometre classical event of the FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 2017 was held on 1 March 2017.Start list A 10 kilometre classical qualification competition was held on 22 February 2017 for those participants that do not have enough FIS points to qualify automatically to other distances in the World Ski Championships. ==Results== ===Qualification=== The race was held on 22 February 2017.Qualification start listQualification results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" !
